title: GSAP is Now Completely Free, Even for Commercial Use!
description: Along with the version 3.13 release, GSAP, and all its awesome plugins, are now freely available to everyone. GSAP is Now Completely Free, Even for Commercial Use! originally published on CSS-Tricks, which is part of the DigitalOcean family. You should get the newsletter.
author: Ryan Trimble
excerpt: Along with the version 3.13 release, GSAP, and all its awesome plugins, are now freely available to everyone.
text: Back in October, the folks behind the GreenSock Animation Platform (GSAP) joined forces with Webflow, the visual website builder. html:
Back in October, the folks behind the GreenSock Animation Platform (GSAP) joined forces with Webflow, the visual website builder. Now, the teamâ€™s back with another announcement: Along with the version 3.13 release, GSAP, and all its awesome plugins, are now freely available to everyone.

Thanks toÂ WebflowÂ GSAP is nowÂ 100% freeÂ including all of the bonus plugins likeÂ SplitText,Â MorphSVG, and all the others that were exclusively available to Club GSAP members. Thatâ€™s right, the entire GSAP toolset is free,Â even for commercial use!Â ðŸ¤¯

Webflow is celebrating over on their blog as well:

With Webflowâ€™s support, the GSAP team can continue to lead the charge in product and industry innovation while allowing even more developers the opportunity to harness the full breadth of GSAP-powered motion.

Check out the GSAP blog to read more about the announcement, then go animate something awesome and share it with us!
